global.capped_job_points: Your Job Points are capped. FUCK!
global.capped_merit_points: Your Merit Points are capped. FUCK!
global.food_wears_off: Fuck! Your food wore off. EAT SOME DAMN FOOD.

info.description: Loud, chaotic, and full of love (and expletives).
info.introduction: YO what the FUCK. It's ya boy, Kolo.
info.name: Kolo

global.member_left_alliance: ${member} left and didn't even say I love you, what the fuck?!
global.other_party_joined_alliance: Hey a party joined the alliance.
global.other_party_left_alliance: Son of a BITCH! That whole party left and didn't say I love you.
global.reminder_canteen: AYO! another Mystical Canteen is ready! Chug that shit!
global.reminder_mog_locker: YO, your Mog Locker lease is about to EXPIRE. SHIT! Better fix that before all your crap gets tossed out!
global.reminder_moglophone: HOLY SHIT, another Moglophone is ready! LET'S GOOOOO!
global.reminder_plate: OH SHIT, another Shiny Ra'Kaznarian Plate is ready! Snatch that bad boy up!
global.reraise_check: YO, YOU DON'T GOT RERAISE ON. YOU TRYNA DIE FOR REAL OR WHAT?!
global.reraise_wears_off: Your Reraise is gone. FUCK. I hope you live in constant fear.
global.signet_wears_off: Your ${signet} is gone! Wow, amazing! Just fantastic! LOVE THAT!
global.sublimation_charged: Awww shiiit. Sublimation is ready to use.
global.vorseal_wearing: OH SHIT! You got maybe 10 minutes left on your Vorseal!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: Some asshole gave you alliance lead! Fuck!
global.you_are_now_party_leader: Oh, no! I don't want to lead! FUCK!
global.you_joined_alliance: You joined some shitty alliance. Fuck!
global.you_joined_party: You joined some shitty party. Fuck!
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party joined an alliance. FUCK!
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your FUCKING PARTY left the FUCKING ALLIANCE.
